content.text: I'm from Pittsburgh too! What's your favorite thing about the city?
I love the architecture! It's so unique and beautiful. What about you?
I love the food! There are so many great restaurants to choose from.
That's true! I love going out to eat in Pittsburgh.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go hiking and biking. I also love photography.
That's cool! I like to go hiking and biking too. I'm not very good at photography, but I enjoy it.
It's not about being good at it, it's about enjoying the process.
I agree! I'm glad to meet another Pittsburgher.
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone from the same city.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I like to play video games and watch movies.
I like video games too! What games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but my favorite is probably Call of Duty.
I've never played Call of Duty, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a lot of fun! You should give it a try.
I might have to! It sounds like we have a lot in common.
We do! It's nice to meet you.
You too! It's nice to meet you too
